intro: Leiachenis sparsiflorus, commonly known as the sparse-flowered leiachenis, is a unique plant species belonging to the family Meliaceae. It is characterized by its delicate, lance-shaped leaves that are usually arranged alternately along the stem. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pale yellow or greenish in color. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, often found in shaded, moist environments. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
